content: In what popular fantasy series would you find characters such as Frodo Baggins, Gandalf, and Aragorn?

I believe that the characters Frodo Baggins, Gandalf, and Aragorn are from the "Lord of the Rings" series by J.R.R. Tolkien. This is a very famous fantasy series that includes books like "The Fellowship of the Ring," "The Two Towers," and "The Return of the King." The series is known for its complex world-building, intricate storytelling, and memorable characters. It has also been adapted into a highly successful film series directed by Peter Jackson.
